a.title: School Messenger Phone Call Opt In/Out
a.span: School Messenger Phone Call Opt In/Out

li.a: School Messenger Phone Call Opt In/Out

div.p: It’s a new year here at Afton Public Schools and what better way to kick off "2020" than to unveil our brand-new webspace for our School! Our new webpage features the latest web and eLearning platform to provide students, parents, and teachers with the best tools for success.
Take a chance to explore our new webspace and come back regularly for news and updates! Please be patient with us we continue to update. Any positive feedback and suggestions will be welcome!
All 9-12th Grade Parents please help out the school by completing this survey. The survey may be found by clicking the link below; and it must be completed by Thursday, April 30th.
Afton School Board member, Mike Nelson, and Clerk, Teresa McCoin, serve faculty members ice cream sundaes at their monthly meeting on 2-19-2020

div.div:
